name: Aerie Ouphes
oracle_text:
Sacrifice Aerie Ouphes: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Antler Skulkin
oracle_text: {2}: Target white creature gains persist until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Every skull has a tale to tell, and a skulkin is many dire tales cobbled together.

name: Ballynock Trapper
oracle_text:
{T}: Tap target creature.
Whenever you cast a white spell, you may untap Ballynock Trapper.
flavor_text: No matter how large or small, fierce or fleeting, the kithkin have a trap for it.

name: Banishing Knack
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."
flavor_text: Suddenly he realized that everything was connected by invisible strings, strings that could be pulled—or cut.

name: Battlegate Mimic
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both red and white, Battlegate Mimic has base power and toughness 4/2 until end of turn and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: Mimics don't need perfect disguises. They need only the perfect victims: the naive, the young, or the poor of sight.

name: Beckon Apparition
oracle_text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: When a graveyard is full, the gwyllions rattle the tombs and unleash the spirits into the sky.

name: Cenn's Enlistment
oracle_text:
Create two 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
flavor_text: The more the scarier.

name: Cinder Pyromancer
oracle_text:
{T}: Cinder Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Whenever you cast a red spell, you may untap Cinder Pyromancer.
flavor_text: "If the whole world burns, I'll never grow cold."

name: Clout of the Dominus
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has haste.

name: Desecrator Hag
oracle_text: When Desecrator Hag enters the battlefield, return to your hand the creature card in your graveyard with the greatest power. If two or more cards are tied for greatest power, you choose one of them.
flavor_text: Loose earth is not a burial but an appetizer.

name: Double Cleave
oracle_text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: "When in doubt, kill 'em twice."

name: Drain the Well
oracle_text: Destroy target land. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Trows have learned that it's not wise to eat cinders without a bucket or two of water nearby.

name: Dream Thief
oracle_text:
Flying
When Dream Thief enters the battlefield, draw a card if you've cast another blue spell this turn.
flavor_text: Awylla's salvaged dreams would finally be put to good use.

name: Duergar Assailant
oracle_text: Sacrifice Duergar Assailant: It deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Some duergars dismiss the world above as a fable. They react violently when their comfortable illusions are dispelled.

name: Edge of the Divinity
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+2.
As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +2/+1.
flavor_text: The divinity's patronage confers both wicked grace and graceful wickedness.

name: Fang Skulkin
oracle_text: {2}: Target black creature gains wither until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text:
"Everything falls apart. But living things fall apart in the most fascinating ways."
—Mowagh the Gwyllion

name: Favor of the Overbeing
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.
As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.
flavor_text: Enlightenment is the mundane seen from the vantage point of the divine.

name: Fire at Will
oracle_text: Fire at Will deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target attacking or blocking creatures.
flavor_text: "Make these shots count. The more foes we drop now, the fewer we'll have trying to kill us later."

name: Flame Jab
oracle_text:
Flame Jab deals 1 damage to any target.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
flavor_text:
"Fire's out. Should be safe now."
—Gnarltrunk

name: Gift of the Deity
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)
As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and all creatures able to block it do so.

name: Grazing Kelpie
oracle_text:
{G/U}, Sacrifice Grazing Kelpie: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Harvest Gwyllion
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: She speaks only in vile epithets, spitting out curses and obscenities that harm others just by the hearing.

name: Heartlash Cinder
oracle_text:
Haste
Chroma — When Heartlash Cinder enters the battlefield, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of red mana symbols in the mana costs of permanents you control.

name: Hobgoblin Dragoon
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
flavor_text: The faeries snickered at first. A common hob in Oona's skies? But his lance ended their mockery, and now the sound of a cicada's wings brings a shudder to the faerie heart.

name: Hoof Skulkin
oracle_text: {3}: Target green creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It hunts with the memory of a long lost herd.

name: Hotheaded Giant
oracle_text:
Haste
Hotheaded Giant enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it unless you've cast another red spell this turn.
flavor_text: As he races the moon each night, he draws a glowing equator across the world.

name: Inside Out
oracle_text:
Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Seyden's temperament didn't take well to the puca's magic. Nor did his face.

name: Jawbone Skulkin
oracle_text: {2}: Target red creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Ah, skull of shrew—a very potent substance. In powdered form, it gives thrice the zing of noggle hoof pulp."
—Boghald, Barrenton medic

name: Kithkin Spellduster
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{W}, Sacrifice Kithkin Spellduster: Destroy target enchantment.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Kithkin Zealot
oracle_text: When Kithkin Zealot enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each black and/or red permanent target opponent controls.
flavor_text: The more his flock fears, the more power he wields.

name: Merrow Bonegnawer
oracle_text:
{T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard.
Whenever you cast a black spell, you may untap Merrow Bonegnawer.
flavor_text: Banished to the Dark Meanders for hideous crimes, some merrows find a taste for the darkness . . . and the dead.

name: Merrow Levitator
oracle_text:
{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a blue spell, you may untap Merrow Levitator.
flavor_text: He fancies himself a master thief, claiming to "steal the ground" from his victims.

name: Monstrify
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
flavor_text: Gackt came to regret keeping his pet toads on his head.

name: Nettle Sentinel
oracle_text:
Nettle Sentinel doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you cast a green spell, you may untap Nettle Sentinel.
flavor_text: Though Shadowmoor's monster-haunted wilds beckon, she never leaves her post.

name: Nightsky Mimic
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both white and black, Nightsky Mimic has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: A mimic need only touch a being to learn its shape, but touching usually leads to mauling and messily eating.

name: Nip Gwyllion
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Once your life and all your worldly possessions have been surrendered to her, a gwyllion can be surprisingly civilized.

name: Noggle Bandit
oracle_text: Noggle Bandit can't be blocked except by creatures with defender.
flavor_text: Noggles believe that they were the first race ever to walk Shadowmoor. They don't "steal." They just take back what's rightfully theirs.

name: Noggle Bridgebreaker
oracle_text: When Noggle Bridgebreaker enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "It's always funny till someone gets hurt. Then it's hilarious."

name: Odious Trow
oracle_text: {1}{B/G}: Regenerate Odious Trow.
flavor_text: Trows are the vile trolls that lurk in the bogs of Shadowmoor. They reappear each night to frighten the living and gnaw the dead.

name: Oona's Grace
oracle_text:
Target player draws a card.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
flavor_text: Oona grants her favored subjects a dream from her own guarded heart.

name: Puncture Blast
oracle_text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Puncture Blast deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Gnarltrunk didn't remember having quite that many knotholes.

name: Raven's Crime
oracle_text:
Target player discards a card.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
flavor_text: It plucks away memories like choice bits of carrion.

name: Recumbent Bliss
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Kithkin somnomancers enjoy the peaceful dreams wafting from their victims.

name: Rendclaw Trow
oracle_text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Riverfall Mimic
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both blue and red, Riverfall Mimic has base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Mimics don't hide their natural form well, but their disguises work well enough on boggarts.

name: Scourge of the Nobilis
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has "{R/W}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Shell Skulkin
oracle_text: {3}: Target blue creature gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: Skulkins confer strange benefits on unsuspecting patrons.

name: Shorecrasher Mimic
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both green and blue, Shorecrasher Mimic has base power and toughness 5/3 until end of turn and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Aurora replaced the changelings' innocence with malice and their curiosity with hunger.

name: Slippery Bogle
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: Bogles are very tasty if you can get the skin off. It's getting a blade on them that's the problem.

name: Smoldering Butcher
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: A cinder's axe bears no marks from parrying a foe's blade.

name: Snakeform
oracle_text:
Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Snake with base power and toughness 1/1.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Losing his possessions distressed him, but the lack of limbs was strangely liberating.

name: Soul Reap
oracle_text: Destroy target nongreen creature. Its controller loses 3 life if you've cast another black spell this turn.
flavor_text: Their thoughtweft carried Darial's last thoughts back to his doun. They sorely wished it had not.

name: Stream Hopper
oracle_text: {U/R}: Stream Hopper gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Like many who dwell in Shadowmoor now, he was robbed of his better half by the Aurora.

name: Talara's Bane
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a green or white creature card from it. You gain life equal to that creature card's toughness, then that player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"Your thoughts betray you."
—Illulia of Nighthearth

name: Tilling Treefolk
oracle_text: When Tilling Treefolk enters the battlefield, you may return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: He digs his roots into barren ground, searching for old seeds that never had the chance to sprout.

name: Trapjaw Kelpie
oracle_text:
Flash
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Travelers in these waters leave a bit of themselves behind.

name: Unmake
oracle_text: Exile target creature.
flavor_text: A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.

name: Wickerbough Elder
oracle_text:
Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Living scarecrows make a mockery of the natural order. Dead ones make fine hats."

name: Wilderness Hypnotist
oracle_text: {T}: Target red or green creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I felt as if I were moving in brackish water, as if I were drowning, even though I knew I stood on dry land."
—Dindun of Kulrath Mine

name: Woodlurker Mimic
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both black and green, Woodlurker Mimic has base power and toughness 4/5 until end of turn and gains wither until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: A mimic's disguise fools its victims just long enough to draw them within range of its venomous tentacles.
